## Reading Data

Reading in the Seoul bike sharing data set, using locale argument to fix error with element 1.
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
bike <- read_csv("https://www4.stat.ncsu.edu/~online/datasets/SeoulBikeData.csv", locale=locale(encoding="latin1"))
```
